scripts.dev: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 node scripts/dev-logger.mjs --turbo
scripts.dev:local: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 concurrently -n "NEXT.JS,PHP-LOCAL" -c "cyan,yellow" "node scripts/dev-logger.mjs --turbo" "cd Bullcasino && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8000"
scripts.dev:fullstack: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 concurrently -n "NEXT.JS,PHP-LOCAL" -c "cyan,yellow" "node scripts/dev-logger.mjs --turbo" "cd Bullcasino && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8000"
scripts.dev:with-casino: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 concurrently -n "NEXT,CASINO-PHP,CASINO-NODE" -c "cyan,yellow,green" "node scripts/dev-logger.mjs --turbo" "cd Bullcasino && php artisan serve --host=127.0.0.1 --port=8000" "cd Bullcasino/server && node app.js"
scripts.dev:no-casino: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 node scripts/dev-logger.mjs --turbo
scripts.dev:standard: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 node scripts/dev-logger.mjs
scripts.dev:fast: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=16384 node scripts/dev-logger.mjs --turbo
scripts.dev:silicon: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=20480 node scripts/dev-logger.mjs --turbo
scripts.dev:windows: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 node scripts/dev-logger.mjs --turbo
scripts.build: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 next build
scripts.build:fast: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 next build
scripts.build:silicon: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=16384 next build
scripts.build:windows: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=12288 next build
scripts.start:fast: node scripts/platform-check.mjs && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 next start -p ${PORT:-3000}
scripts.test: echo 'Running production readiness checks...' && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run lint
scripts.deploy-check: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.casino:install: cd Bullcasino && composer install && npm install
